with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    validations.validate_argument(value, typedef)
pytest.mark.parametrize('value,typedef', [(2.0, type_defaults.
    TypeDefaultBounds('a', int, bound_obj=bounds.Bounds('a', lower_bound=0,
    upper_bound=1))), (2, type_defaults.TypeDefaultBounds('a', float,
    bound_obj=bounds.Bounds('a', lower_bound=0, upper_bound=1)))])
